website_summaries.verdict: Pets come running when they hear you sign on, knowing it's time to talk and get a treat.
pros: Delivers 720p live video via 130° wide-angle lens with 4x digital zoom
Pawbo Life app supports both iPhone and Android (iOS 8 and later for Apple, 4.0.3 and later for Android)
Treat compartment fits most pellet food
cons: Unit is top-heavy and trips relatively easy
Doesn't work well with iPhone X

customer_reviews.title: Great pet sitter!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I can see my dog and my cat through my phone, what is even better is that this thing has two way speaker, so I can hear them! The only thing might be needed to improve, is that the monitor can't turn, it is fixed to a certain angle, so the range is limited. Beside this, everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Eve J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on advertisement, it looks so interesting so I purchased on Amazon. however, this was the worst decision that I had made of sending my $170 on this garbege. it didn't come with 360 degree, ok, that's fine. but it only can see one direction, and that's it. it made super loud noise, so u can't use at night when your not at home. you know pets are usually running around or chasing around within the house, if you couldn't turn the angle to.360 then you become useless. overall, this is not worth it. i bought a security camera which has audio function, 360 degree and it only cost $50 from Amazon. It wasted my 170$. USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: Yingmin F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My cats already figured it out! "When this thing makes noise, I get treats" so she always comes right over to it. Our other cat could care less tho. The video quality is ok but could be better. The wide angle lens is perfect for even large rooms. Overall the whole thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I have two...one for my home and one for my motor home...I LOVE them!!! I had a little snaffoo when the first one arrived...I contacted the company and they replaced it no questions asked it was so pleasant that I ordered the second one. I can see, hear and play with my pet as well as give it treats. It helps me to monitor my motor home while I'm out as well. I can hear to make sure that my generator is running to keep my pet cool while I am out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love our pawbo. Its so nice to have when we go away to keep an eye on our kitty and the house. Doesn't have the greatest night vision but we usually leave a night light out so that helps. My original one ended up dying so I got in touch with their customer service. They were beyond helpful and really quick to reply to my emails. They went back and forth with me for a few days trouble shooting before just sending me a replacement unit. They even sent me a prepaid UPS shipping label to send them my broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on Customer Service from company
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to connect the Pawbo our Wifi. The device could not "locate" it. We followed all recommended instructions. Amazon offered technical help so we tried that but ended with an answer to call manufacturer's Customer service. We tried that but got an answering machine. We left our name and phone number and in the four days since we called have not received a call back. I called again today and got only an answering machine again. Bad or impossible customer service is a pet peeve of mine. You need to stand behind your products.
customer_reviews.author: Laurabbnl

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get a hold of customer service
customer_reviews.text: I can’t connect my Pawbo and am not able to get in contact customer service. I need the MAC Address of the Pawbo device in order to connect it to my WiFi however it is not disclosed on product. Waiting to hear back from company but I am not able to connect Pawbo so I can’t review how the product works. Product would only work when I was home which was pointless. I couldn’t connect to the Pawbo when I wasn’t in close range to the device which defeats the entire purpose of buying this to watch pets when you’re not home.. sigh.. waste of money and time. I will be returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Present for my pet obsessed parents 😊
customer_reviews.text: They love it! The picture quality is great and setting up the app is pretty quick and simple. They have three cats that they like to check up on and they’re both pretty obsessed with this little toy. The treat dispenser works well- but stick to small, dry, light snacks. We used those freeze-dried little shrimp and it work great. Ps. You CAN turn off the little doorbell noise that goes off (loudly) every time somebody checks the camera on the app. I highly recommend disabling that feature. It gets your pet’s attention? But it will also scare the crap out of your spouse.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind at Work
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing, in that it allows me to watch my pets while I am away at work. It provides a peace of mind I have never had before. I'm totally one of those people that seriously worry the house will burn down while I am away or my pet will get hurt while I am gone. Being able to watch and interact with my pets remotely is a total relief and has helped reduce my anxiety. The laser got stuck shortly after we started using it, but I expect customer service will help me out. Otherwise, perfect find. I'm going to be buying a few more for my home and as gifts for my family/friends!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Carlison

customer_reviews.title: Fun gadget! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Neat little gadget that keeps the doggie entertained while I am gone for work. Doggie is still kinda scared of the device but she is learning that it gives her treats. Quality of camera is good for the price. Camera does not move so you have to set it at the right height and angle to see. You can hear the room and with a push of an icon the pets can hear you. There is a signal once you connect to the device and you can alert the doggie before you dispense the treat. It took no time to train my dog to use it. To not be scared of it is another thing 😂
customer_reviews.author: Trisha I Henry

customer_reviews.title: Loud static noise and poor video quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and have had nothing but trouble with it from the first day. Connected fine, however I have an iphone 7 and hear nothing but loud popping/static noises whenever I go into access the camera from my phone. The video quality is also not good, it freezes and I am barely able to see my dog. I have tried adjusting the distance from the router, etc. and can no matter what I can not get this product to give me good video. Disappointed and will unfortunately be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brandish

customer_reviews.title: My cats love the treats I like being able to see what they’re doing.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Finally got ahold of support and they did a quick update to the software and things are working again. They also have a new website. This worked great for about 2 months and now, I cant get it to work when I’m on a different network. Tried to visit the site listed in the booklet but it comes up as unsafe and is a random Russian website. Tried calling for support and just got an answering machine. Tried using Amazon’s tech support, they were great, but they couldn’t get it to work either.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: A huge relief to have!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a lot of anxiety on vacation trips because I worried about my cat at home. We had a friend come by to feed him and clean the bathroom, but I still worried needlessly. With this we could check in on him whenever I want and play with him and feed him treats. You can take videos and photos as well. The night vision isn't great but we have smart bulbs near it that we can turn on with our phone to see him better. I do wish they had other attachments or devices you could use with it!
customer_reviews.author: RiS

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but....
customer_reviews.text: It's just OK. It dispenses treats remotely as advertised, The camera has no night vision at all, which means you have to leave your house lights on if you want to check on your pets at night. Night vision is available on other much less expensive web cams, so not sure why this one doesn't have it. Our cat responds to the doorbell sign when we sign on remotely. She sits and waits for a treat. She doesn't play with the laser pointer. Just watches it move around her. Sometimes she knocks over the unit trying to get more treats. Not sure how a dog would react to it. Might chew it up to get at the goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions easily. Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: It started malfunctioning after a little less than a year, and nothing happened to cause it to do this. Just one day it wasn’t working the way it should. I’d like a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat enjoyed playing with the laser
customer_reviews.text: This met my need of a way to dispense some medicine to my cat while away on a business trip. It worked well. Positives: Cat enjoyed playing with the laser, dispensed properly, saved images and videos. Negatives: Video quality and responsiveness when lighting is low, camera doesn't point down enough to see if cat eats treat. Dispense button too close to call button.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when Amazon had it as a deal of the day for almost half off!! I expected the installation and set up instructions to be in the box but instead I first had to download the app (which is free)! I like that others can download the app to check in on Brinlee. I still don’t know what some of the controls do. I do like the doorbell feature! Whenever someone opens the app to see Brinlee, the camera makes a doorbell sound to let her know someone is watching! The picture is usually behind or sometimes fuzzy but I know she can hear me talking because she tilts her head. I’m so excited to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worth $150, what I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when you habe a good wifi signal. Manual laser light kinda sucks but the automatic laser light feature is cool. My cat still dont chase the light but its still worth it to me. My model does not have a night vision feature but my mom said hers does. Neither of us have the light up ears that go on top. Something I will be looking into
customer_reviews.author: Love To Shop

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED!!!!  Nope. Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: Update- the company contacted me to talk through my problems with the machine. After some initial problem solving with no solution it was agreed they would send me a new machine. Thank you!! The voice sounds like the teacher from Charlie Brown. Can’t understand a bit of it. Impossible to get it connected to wifi. It was connected and then it kept saying disconnected. I tried everything. I tried contacting customer service and got vm. I left a message and never received return call. Going in garbage
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Irvin

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: FIRE HAZARD! Be careful! I followed directions to the letter and the top started smoking and got extremely hot while I was trying to set it up!
customer_reviews.author: Bimbo Savant

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our tech-savvy son to use to keep an eye on his cat while he's away from home. It has never worked, never worked with his phone, it's been just one big $149.00 mistake. The time for returns was past by the time we realized it was worthless. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: New England Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Pawbo out of business? - NO - Update: it's working again!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It's working again! They did an upgrade and I can finally use it again away from my home network. Updating rating to 5 stars because I do love this product. I think Pawbo is out of business. Haven’t been able to connect outside of my home network and I got an email bounce back when trying to contact their support. Also, looks like their certificate expired. Any similar experiences?
customer_reviews.author: catty

customer_reviews.title: Laser & picture quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Although the item did work well for the first few months, the picture quality is very poor, especially at night. The Laser stopped working 4 months later and night vision is nil to none. I asked for assistance from their tech service but they do not respond, especially 3 months after purchasing product. Not worth the price. Buying from another company at 75% lower cost than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after the latest iOS upgrade
customer_reviews.text: We used to enjoy it a lot, but then after the latest iOS upgrade, the app stopped working. We can't connect to our Pawbo anymore and couldn't reset either. I've contacted the tech support many times, but each time they just refer me to future updates with the app. When the app actually did get updated, it still didn't work. Now the Pawbo is a piece of not functioning garbage in the house..... Can anyone fix the app issue?
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described. I love how easy it was to set up. It's a clear video feed a majority of the time. If it's dark in the room or if I'm on the same wifi it's a little grainy. It's a clear stream from work which is why I bought it. The treat feature is so fun, of course I wish it could hold more treats but it's great. The laser is fun but my dog could care less. I wish I would have bought one that allowed me to move the camera view because sometimes my dog lays just beyond the camera view. Not a big deal. Overall really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KTag

customer_reviews.title: Image is pretty clear, my cat learned to love the doorbell ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars had the laser not broke less than 3 weeks after purchasing. Image is pretty clear, my cat learned to love the doorbell chime that usually meant treats and hearing my voice. She actually PLAYED along with the laser too. It was great. But it's super disappointing that the laser broke already and the manufacturer isn't responding to me. That aside, it's a great product. My only wish-list item would be the ability to remote control the camera and be able to scan the room. The laser does this and it'd be great if the cam could too.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I love seeing my boy
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The first one had some issues with the speaker, but I worked with customer service on Amazon and they sent me a new one right away, which works and is awesome--I can check in on my honey, and send him treaties while I'm away at work. He's trained to come running now as soon as he hears the birds chirping!
customer_reviews.author: daisychick

customer_reviews.title: Interactive Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an interactive camera to check in on the cats and feed them treats. Have a security camera that I can talk to them and thought a device that dispenses treats would be ideal and it is. Buddy learned immediately the initial ring would either give him a treat or trigger the laser toy. He's not much into the laser part of it, but he really likes the treats and it's nice I can talk to them when I'm away or at work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great price compared to other pet cameras, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for christmas. She travels a lot and needs to leave her cat home for a day or two. The cat really does respond to it, she can check on the cat virtually, and the cat loves using the laser light.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Is Pawbo Out of Business?
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if the Pawbo company is out of business? I'd gotten one of these for my daughter, and we really enjoyed being able to check in on our kitty. But it no longer works, and the Pawbo website is down...or Russian...or something. And we can't find a customer service number to try and contact them. Does anyone have any information?
customer_reviews.author: Joeli D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it to work! It's connected...says it is. But when I open the app it makes this ridiculously loud doorbell sound...and I constantly get a little circle waiting for picture. Trying again results in another obnoxious doorbell. I bought it over a year ago and am finally trying to use it to monitor a foster cat recovering from a gunshot wound.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leigh

customer_reviews.title: This little Gadget is adorable entertains my children for hours it's nice that you ...
customer_reviews.text: This little Gadget is adorable entertains my children for hours it's nice that you can contact your pet when you are out and about delivering him treats and playing with the laser easy to set up video is pretty nice quality all my friends are purchasing these after I show them I can see my cat from home I definitely am going to purchase the other playful gadgets they sell
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Easy to set up. My cat loves the treat dispenser. She'll come out of hiding as soon as she hears the notification. She doesn't play with the laser much though. There is a little lag in the video feed which doesn't make a difference if you just want to check in and talk to your pet. There was an issue with calibrating the laser but customer support was very helpful and there is a video on how to recalibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed because other reviews that I read about this camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who is tech savoy so she can watch her dog while working but not happening because she can’t get pawbo to connect to her WiFi. She called tech support and she has not to this date been able to get it working. Very disappointed because other reviews that I read about this camera seemed ok.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Full-Time Workers w/ Dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: This allows me to check up on my 5-mo puppy while I'm at work. A little delay in the microphone when I try to talk to him. But the video picture quality is great and I feel much better at work when I know he is safe in his pen and not barking. I haven't mastered the laser toy yet but it is nice to have and I have used it twice to get my pups attention and for a mid-day break/play time with my puppy. Would absolutely recommend if you work full-time!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: The connection is so bad and the customer service didn't reply my requests at all
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if I can still return the product now after several months. I had the connection problems early on. I was only able to connect one of the cellphones. I filled out the "support" to the customer service and didn't get any answer. Recently, I did nothing and suddenly the voice came up saying "wifi disconnect". I've checked that nothing went wrong with my wifi at home. I am totally helpless now and don't know what to do with this product. Very disappointing about their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ali T

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Used this now for almost a year. Pros- Treat dispenser Two way microphone Easy to install Cons- No night vision Low light means slow video display Wish it could house more treats Tech support were efficient when we had issues.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet camera, and also throws treats, and has a laser toy. It works great and my cat loves it. I can talk to her! The first unit I received was defective and the customers service to replace it was outstanding. My only wish is that there were better directions on how to use the various features. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyze

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Fun little toy! Love tuning in to watch and play with my cat during lunch breaks at work! The treat feature isn’t perfect, and the laser pointer is difficult to control, but it is a great addition to any pet lovers home.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: Setup is hard, but the camera is reliable. Had to return third Pawbo because it wouldn't connect to wifi.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these and was planning on adding a third. However, after two hours of fidgeting with the very limited setup options on Pawbo, I was flustered and returned it. The other two work perfectly, but the setup is just infuriatingly complex. The iOS app does not support iPhone X models either. For as expensive as this is, I'd expect a more strealined UX in the app and an easier setup. It's a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Spoiling my cat while im away
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so I can see my cat when I'm away at work and I can give her treats like she deserves because she is the queen
customer_reviews.author: ERIC HOLTMANN

customer_reviews.title: which is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a little low resolution but it works for what we need. My pup loves the treat dispenser but doesn't understand the laser pointer. That part seems to be for cats only. You can't tell who else is using the app though, which is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Check in on your furry friends!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this a few months and absolutely love it, and so do our dogs!!! It is super fun to see our dogs and talk to them, the video works great and it is fun to send them treats. The Laser light show is so fun to use!! A great purchase! If you are thinking about this, go ahead, easy to install and so fun!
customer_reviews.author: N. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: great item all around
customer_reviews.text: this item is well worth the $, good picture, different sound options, and a laser pointer that I didn't realize also came with this. the treat dispenser is a nice feature as well. when you check up a door bell tone is heard for your pet , and it isn't long before they know! would recommend for sure. this can be set on the floor, or on a table, not just a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats!
customer_reviews.text: The Pawbo I have works great. The app is easy to install, pair to the Pawbo, as well as an easy user interface. My cats learned how to use it in less than a day. It provided peace of mind while on vacation, and my mother loves to be able to check in and visit with my cats. Pawbo customer service is great too.
customer_reviews.author: RABECCA COLLIN

customer_reviews.title: Did Pawbo go out of business?
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these and loved it but it stopped working. After some failed problem solving efforts, I decided to contact their customer service. The website no longer exists. Did they go out of business?
customer_reviews.author: julia goolia

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Could not connect to two of these devices as I initially bought a used/like new device and then a brand new one when I was still having connectivity issues. This device requires a certain type of security setting on your WiFi network. One that seems to not be the default of how ones WiFi is set up. Could not get the device to connect through WiFi or through the alternate routes provided by Pawbo. Virtually no customer support to troubleshoot. Very misleading product description given its intricate specs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Slow connection. Keeps stuttering despite our consistently fast internet ...
customer_reviews.text: Slow connection. Keeps stuttering despite our consistently fast internet speeds. Requires me to cycle power every time I unplug/move it. Laser stutters too much and is difficult to control. Overall, it's OK, but I'm not at all impressed. Despite these issues, it (mostly) works as advertised. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for my dog who has anxiety when she is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my dog who has anxiety when she is left home alone. I just wish that you could turn the camera so you could see other parts. That's why I'm giving it a 4 star but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Susana Pachas

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I loved seeing my cats when I was away. I had someone coming in to feed them but nobody staying with them. I was able to see them and talk to them and give them treats.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Very cool with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so cool! There’s definitely room for improvement, like I wish it would toss the treats a little further and I wish the audio was better, but it’s still very cool. I’m hopeful that future generations will have these enhancements.
customer_reviews.author: Lilybet

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Being able to look in and interact with our two kitties has made travel more fun. The connection works quite well for us even when overseas, as long as we had strong wi-fi for our phones. Only downside is that there is too much lag for the manual control of the laser toy to be much fun, but overall still 5 stars. Well-designed Android app, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price but def not state of the art. Works fine tho, picture quality seems to wain and the speech feature is glichy. But it gets the job dun and the treat and laser tools are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conticello

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It was basically impossible to connect to our WiFi and our phones. When it finally did the picture quality wasn’t good at all. The laser is a great thing to have but that’s if it worked for more than two seconds. It lagged way too much to have any fun with our cat. The best thing about this was the bird noises it made which drove my cat crazy (in a good way) and the treat dispenser was totally fine. Also the app was terrible to use and was delayed as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great added features
customer_reviews.text: We love our Pawbo! Gives us a piece of mind when we are out of town we can always check in. The little door bell to let our cat know when we are works great too. The add on toys and accessories are a great idea! I really hope they come out with more so we can build a little playground for our baby! : )
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: the product is awful, at least mine came defective. I waited these months to leave the review cause I was travelling and wanted to try it in different networks and wifi. However, the connexion is poor, it never works for a long time without crashing. The only way it works "ok" is when I'm in the same place that the Pawbo is, and that doesn't make any sense, I mean this is supposed to be used to watch ur pet when u are not in the home. I also contacted the "customer service" which was totally useless, they told to "Please unplug everything"
customer_reviews.author: Martha Noguera Zampino

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 treats..
customer_reviews.text: This only holds 8 treats at a time.. way to small a number if I wanted to keep my dog busy while I was at work. The laser was a bit inconsistent too and I was afraid it would harm my dogs vision if he stared directly at it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My pawbo arrived and was mostly functional but had defective sound. The customer support was good. They were able to verify my issue remotely, sent me a shipping label, so I didn't need to pay return shipping and cross shipped me another, once it was in the mail. My cat turns out to be not very into laser toys in general but my dog is, so that's been fun. The treat dispenser is actually mostly how I interact with my dog. It's nice to be able to feed her a bit when I'm gone.
customer_reviews.author: mr_vash

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My Pawbo life worked wonderfully for 6 weeks. Suddenly it stopped connecting except for when I am inside my home. I’ve reset and reinstalled the app with no success. It’s unusable and I’m so sad; I wasted money and I can’t see my pup and throw her treats when I’m out. In addition, the company is non-existent. The FAQ and support in the app lead me to error pages and the website is leads me to warning pages. Amazon needs to stop selling bootleg products that are a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... up on a whim during PrimeDay and i am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up on a whim during PrimeDay and i am glad that I did. Pros: Easy to set up decent camera holds 9 treats choice of sounds decent enough mic and speaker Makes a doorbell chime when you connect via the app... i love this...no surprises Cons: I wish it had night vision.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product with legit (actual) customer service
customer_reviews.text: OK I never write these. However I was very much impressed with the customer service this product and company provided. Not only was the product as described and functional (and I dig it and it’s so fun to show friends), but the customer service was excellent, and Everything that seems to be missing from companies these days. My cat sitter had broken a key part of one of their products rendering it useless. I reached out to support and asked if I could buy a new piece and they went ahead and sent me a new one for free. Fantastic. Five stars. Happy customer here
customer_reviews.author: Brett W.

customer_reviews.title: Great, except the audio
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can see my dogs when I am away now. But the audio doesn't work well. My words do not come out clear, often just bits of sounds that my dogs can't understand. I'd love it if they could hear me when I say, "Hi girls."
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: I could see what my dogs were doing.
customer_reviews.text: I would return this if I could. The treats just drop from the unit straight down- The suggestion is to place the unit on the box it comes in- how ugly and unsafe for a $150 device. App was easy to install. My voice to my dogs in inftecom was too loud and robot like and scared the dogs. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: janet smith

customer_reviews.title: I like this. It gives me a piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It gives me a piece of mind. I know it doesn't have night vision but an easy, cheap solution for this is automatic night lights. Another feature that would have been nice would be the ability to move the camera in order to see the room, but regardless I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: katie garcia

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product on the customer service alone
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my treat tray and when I contacted Pawbo they were very helpful with quick responses. They also very active and replaced my treat tray in a very quick timeframe. I would recommend this product on the customer service alone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The Pawbo is a excellent product and a great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: The Pawbo is a excellent product and a great company to deal with. The company ships fast and is very responsive with customer questions. I would recommend this product and company to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Franki B

customer_reviews.title: Can only connect to camera on wifi when at home
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the pawbo to be able to keep an eye on our cat (as well as sudoku keep her company). The set up needs happens first by connecting to the camera's wifi, setting a password, etc... as long as your home and connected to the camera's wifi, it works great Here's the kicker.. once you leave the your place and try connecting over mobile data, it doesnt work.. connection failed over and over.. $150 down the drain.. fix it pawbo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneak a peak at pussy
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. We visit the cat, talk to her and see her all from anywhere that has cell reception. Pairs to your home wi-fi. Then hit a button, and it drops some treats on the floor in front of the camera. Way more fun for us than the cat. Bonus. You can make your cat crazy with a laser dot that you control.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Surks

customer_reviews.title: It was really neat, but our laser pointer didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: It was really neat, but our laser pointer didn't work so we returned it. We didn't replace because every time we wanted to check on the cats it was dark out!
customer_reviews.author: J. Leathers Congdon

customer_reviews.title: “Not Quite Ready for Prime Time”
customer_reviews.text: “Not Quite Ready for Prime Time” . . . is the best way to describe this product. The *concept* is fantastic, but the *execution* is not quite there. Well, if you have the patience of Job & the persistence of a commissioned salesperson, you *may* get it to work every once in a while. I plan on returning it when I return home from a trip, then I’ll rebuy a year from now and see if it has been improved a year out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve returned it but I didn’t have time to. I will never buy this product ever again. I will not recommend it. The quality is terrible. The fact that you can’t even really ever get it to work right is terrible. Just awful!
customer_reviews.author: Patty U

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, from China
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been the most difficult thing to try and set up. The instructions are so easy but what it says to do does not work. I’ve contacted their customer service multiple times but this thing is from China and is only allowing emails for customer service. Very annoying, will be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works pretty great
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome and works great. Picture quality is decent, not the best, but good enough. Only negative thing was the laser pointer, it’s not very accurate and can’t really control it that well. Everything else is good. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: It works, it allows you to dial in from anywhere and view the camera and also drop treats, but the laser quit working the third day I had it. The laser points at the inside of the casing now and is not visible from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Easiest setup!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera to watch my post surgery cat. This worked great I was up and running in less than 10 minutes! Loses quality when you zoom in, but it’s fine. Laser toy is fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to overlook on my pets when I am not home. It works great. I can see them clearly, speak to them and give my dog treats. Wish the camera can move side to side for better vision
customer_reviews.author: B V

customer_reviews.title: Check the strength of your WiFi
customer_reviews.text: The Pawbo would not connect to any WiFi stronger than 2.5 or something stupid like that. Didn’t know that when Ii bought it. I was very disappointed. My daughter gave me a cat toy you can pair with it so they can play when we are not home. Now stuck with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I ever made!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I ever made! My cats love it and my family loves it when we travel. Connection has been flawless no matter where we have traveled so far. Only thing I wish for is that they make more accessories.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Lots of connection problems and no tech support
customer_reviews.text: I have had major connection problems with this product. It is frustrating to have it stop working seemingly for no reason, and the issues have been time-consuming to resolve. The tech support system is not very sophisticated, and it is impossible to speak with someone to help you. There are little to no troubleshooting instructions. Would not buy this product if I had it to do over again.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Harsha

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I liked the functionality but intended to get a more widespread vision from the camera. It’s a very narrow camera sight and does not capture a large enough part of the room. Great snack distribution. Cool features with the unit overall. App is flawless
customer_reviews.author: Judy4leafs

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive play time
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our Pawbo as a way to check in and interact with our new kitty. We love it. The picture and video quality is great. Our kitty chewed through the power cord, we contacted customer support...they shipped a new cord at no expense. The treat dispenser is a fun feature too, our cat will run to the camera for a treat when called. Fun way to check in and have a little play time while we're away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pawbo Life is great. It lets me see what my dog is ...
customer_reviews.text: Pawbo Life is great. It lets me see what my dog is doing while I'm not at home. The image is quite clear and video works well as long as I'm on solid wifi. My only concern with Pawbo is that every time I open the app to see my dog, it makes a doorbell noise which makes my dog think I'm home. He goes crazy running around looking for me which is a little heartbreaking to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Choy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pet Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Great views and I can check on my dogs anytime I want! The treat dispenser is their favorite! Thank you for such great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh I

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pet Camera
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this camera, mostly just when I drop the treats or play with the laser. I just wish the video quality was better - which may be my internet.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and less you’re sitting right next to it
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work when you were not on the same Wi-Fi as the Pawbo. It has never worked when I’m away. I even paid for a brand new Wi-Fi system to match what the tech-support said was required. Still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Allynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Always wanted to see what the fur children do while I’m at work. This takes care of that and you can interact with your pet as well!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Camping Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not compatiable with iOS/iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Excited to use this to check on our cat while traveling. However, it will not connect to an iPhone. On the flip side, I was able to connect to it via my partner's Android. I had read other reviews stating they were unable to connect via iPhone and wish I had heeded their warning. Since the cat is primarily my cat, I will be returning it as it is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Deangelia Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... this to help crate train a pup who doesn't like being left alone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help crate train a pup who doesn't like being left alone. Camera works great and the lag is super minimal, the speaker and microphone are fine. Works great as a nanny cam. Only downside is it has 9 treat dispensing slots so it can only dispense 9 treats while you're away. I'm spacing treats out a little bit longer than I would like to and run the risk of that nervous behavior showing up. It's better than nothing, though, and once she's over the crate training phase I'm sure the treat quantity won't matter as much.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah buddy

customer_reviews.title: Only holds 8 treats
customer_reviews.text: I got this to play with kitty while I'm at work. Low stars are for low speaker sound kitty just won't bother to investigate
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Pretty hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: Just remember that the camera is a 720p. So, the video is nothing spectacular. Pretty hard to set up. I'd give it 5 if it wasn't for those two things. I got it on special, otherwise, I wouldn't pay over $100 for it. However, it has proven its worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food product, returned because my cat was scared of it.
customer_reviews.text: Food product, returned because my cat was scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was extremely hard to hook up. Sometimes theres a delay on it but a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan. Little

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what was going on with this product. During set-up, I had to give my wifi password and suddenly none of my computers or phones could connect to our home wifi. Never had this problem before, wouldn't accept the password and it was exactly at the same time. I boxed this product back up and reset my wifi to original factory settings. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: DLS Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't download app...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my brother-in-law and his wife who have three dogs. They spent 4 hours on the phone trying to get the app on their phone and it never happened. So embarrassed and disappointed that their gift didn't work. Spend the extra money and get a better one. They love their new one and were able to set it up in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this can see fur babies when not home great idea
customer_reviews.author: Debora l ducey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful. I get to check in on my handsome little guy while I’m at work. He LOVES getting treats through his new camera friend. Only additional feature I would add would be being able to move the camera so you can angle it wherever the pet is. Also, for parks and rec lovers, the generic doorbell they use on the show is the same one for my camera so my cat freaks out 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Though this is really a neat product and I was excited to get it there’s always a “turtle”!on top of the screen. I checked our internet speed and there’s no problem there. By the time the thing shows a picture of our cat it’s a still blurred image.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Product is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use, too little food, the sound of the horn is poor
customer_reviews.author: Frank Yang

customer_reviews.title: Pawbo is well-loved by my kitty
customer_reviews.text: My kitty really enjoys the Pawbo so much the she sits there waiting for it to treat her. The functionality of the app on the iPhone works great too. I think this generation(2) is much better than the first but it still needs some maturing.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: They really love it as well
customer_reviews.text: This helps me to check in with my fur babies and give them some excitement throughout the day while I am at work. They really love it as well, I only wish it had night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: Pawbo Life Pet Camera: WiFi HD Video with 2-Way Audio, Treat Dispenser and Laser Game, Designed for Dogs and Cats
feature_bullets: Pawbo Life camera (PPC-21CL) w/ 720p HD live video, 130° wide-angle lens, and 4x digital room, capture and record every precious moments from your mobile device.
Built-in microphone/speaker/laser/treat dispenser let you listen, talk and reward your pet's favorite snack or play & interact with your pet anytime, anywhere.
Instant social sharing: snap photos and share your pet and family's adorable images on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
Remote Pawbo Theme Park accessories / control multiple Pawbo cameras / connect up to 8 users simultaneously.

Easy set up Pawbo Life app: support iOS 8 or later (iPhone, iPad and iPod) and Android 4.0.3 or later version. Wi-Fi environment required 802.11b/g/n(2.4GHz) connectivity with WPA2-AES encryption. Pawbo support team via service.usa pawbo.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars595 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
